description: Request for a Screening Opinion under the Town and Country Planning (Environmental Impact Assessment) Regulations 2011 (as amended) as to whether the following proposals constitute Environmental Impact Assessment (EIA) development: works to Archway Gyrarory and sections of roads leading from it including Archway Road, Highgate Hill, St John's Road, Holloway Road and Junction Road, with a site total area of 2.75 hectares.
decision_conditions: SCREENING OPINION: A screening opinion be adopted stating that an Environmental Statement is not required for this proposal, in accordance with the Town and Country Planning (Environmental Impact Assessment) Regulations 2011 including the Town and Country Planning (Environmental Impact Assessment) (Amendment) Regulations 2015.  The development, whilst falling into Schedule 2's 'Description of Development 10 (f) (Infrastructure projects), 'Construction of roads' and exceeding the thresholds listed in column 2, is not within a sensitive area as defined in Part 1 Regulation 2 (1) of the Regulations and would not have significant effects on the local environment to the extent that it would necessitate the submission of an ES. This conclusion is without prejudice to the Council's assessment of any future planning application against the Development Plan.
